name: Example microservice app
description: Example polyglot microservice application: VueJS frontend, Go Auth API issuing JWT tokens, NodeJS Todos API with Redis-based log queue, Java Spring Boot Users API, Python log processor, Zipkin for tracing, Redis for queueing.

kubernetes.build_instructions:
Start Minikube, connect Docker CLI to the Minikube node, and build images with docker-compose so they are available to the cluster.
Commands:
minikube start
eval $(minikube docker-env)
docker-compose build

frontend.name: frontend
frontend.description: VueJS-based UI. Talks to Auth API for authentication, Todos API for CRUD operations, Users API for profiles. Emits tracing data to Zipkin when enabled.

auth_api.name: auth_api
auth_api.description: Go-based authorization service issuing JWT tokens for use with other APIs. Uses Users API for profile data and Zipkin for tracing.

todos_api.name: todos_api
todos_api.description: NodeJS Todos API providing CRUD for user todo records. Publishes create and delete operations to a Redis channel for asynchronous logging. Emits traces to Zipkin.

components.name: TodosLogChannel
components.purpose: publish create and delete event messages for logging

users_api.name: users_api
users_api.description: Java Spring Boot Users API providing user profiles (single user and list).

meta.description: Configures HttpSecurity to match all paths and adds JwtAuthenticationFilter after BasicAuthenticationFilter

components.name: UsersDB
components.description: In-memory H2 database managed by Spring Data JPA and seeded via data.sql

components.name: InitialData
components.statements:
INSERT INTO users (username, firstname, lastname, role) VALUES
  ('admin', 'Foo', 'Bar', 1),
  ('johnd', 'John', 'Doe', 0),
  ('janed', 'Jane', 'Doe', 0);

log_message_processor.name: log_message_processor
log_message_processor.description: Python worker that consumes messages from Redis channel and prints them to stdout. Used for logging of Todos API operations. Emits traces to Zipkin.

redis_queue.name: redis_queue
redis_queue.description: Redis instance used as a queue for logging messages
